Package com.chriswlucas.restaurant

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomerUI
    Interface for the customer uses.
    HostUI
    Generic Interface for host of Restaurant
    Interfaceable
    Defines interfaces available to the restaurant
    ManagerUI
    Interface defining what a manager can do
    WorkerUI
    Generic interface for worker
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarSeat
    Bar Seat is an extension of Table it is a table with one seat
    CLInterface
    CLInteface complete Command Line Interface for Restaurant
    CustomerCLI
    Sets up a command line interface for the customers.
    HostCLI
    Host Command Line Interface
    Job
    Data to be moved around the restaurant.
    JobManager
    Handles moving the jobs around the restaurant for a specific party.
    ManagerCLI
    Manager Command Line Interface implements all methods in ManagerUI
    Menu
    Menu stores food and drink menu items
    MenuItem
    Stores the information for a menu item
    PartyManager
    Handles everything needed to run a party, from start to finish.
    PaymentManager
    Payment Manager handles payments, splitting, and receipt generation
    Receipt
    Receipt handles the creation and displaying of total to customers
    Restaurant
    Manages and modifies the internal state of the Restaurant Holds the user interface fore the Restaurant
    RestaurantInterface
    Stores the interface for the restaurant
    SimulateRestaurant
    Test environment that allows for automatic initialization of restaurant, then enters event loop to switch between Restaurant personal.
    Table
    Tables have size and state
    test
    General scriptable system test
    Ticket
    Ticket that holds all the food items for this particular order.
    UserCLI
    Root class of all CLI classes provides place for common scanner field and convenience methods
    UserInterface
    User interface is root class of CLI and GUI classes primary purpose is to store restaurant reference
    Worker
    Class for restaurant workers Workers maintain a job list can mark any job on the list as done
    WorkerCLI
    Worker Command Line Interface
